title: x86 application reverse engineering and patching
subtitle: I dug deeply inside some closed-source binary applications. Here I'd like to collect what I consider worth sharing

title: Sensor fusion for GPS location estimation with Kalman filters
subtitle: A sneak peak into how I'm using a Kalman filter to combine the GPS position with the vehicle speed to improve the location estimation accuracy.

title: Queue management system
subtitle: Works with Wingesfar and it is build using microservices architecture: Docker containers and native applications. Communication is based on MQTT

title: 5G-CORAL
subtitle: A multi-tier architecture for the Edge and Fog Computing. I designed, developed and showcased the connected cars demo

title: BeSpecular
subtitle:
BeSpecular is an app that lets you help blind & deafblind people identify objects or situations.
More info at www.bespecular.com

title: Smart Anchor
subtitle: A device that tells you if a boat anchor is dragging or not by detecting its vibrations

title: Cross coupled oscillator
subtitle: A sinusoidal oscillator I built to better understand the topic when I was studying it at the university

title: Expomash for EXPO Milano 2015
subtitle: A website that uses the Elo's Algorithm to rank the pavilions at EXPO Milano 2015

title: PSP development and reverse engineering
subtitle: As a teenager I started developing homebrew software for the PlayStationPortable

title: One of my first circuits
subtitle: This is one of my favorite pictures of when I was a kid. Here I'm demonstrating series vs parallel connections.
